original_title: Lee Ritenour and Friends - Live from the Cocoanut Grove
overview: Filmed in Los Angeles in 1990, the complete Live at the Cocoanut Grove will do nothing to alter indifference from jazz purists toward fusion guitarist Lee Ritenour. But hardcore Rit fans and other viewers without a jazz-pop ax to grind will find this concert a particularly stimulating, wonderfully textured musical event built around the star and a parade of international talent.
title: Lee Ritenour and Friends - Live from the Cocoanut Grove
